title: Nefelibato
author: Nefelibato
content: Anyone who has experienced a bull run in this market knows that many cryptocurrencies multiply their price x100.    Rules1. Refrain from sharing investment tips, they are not welcome here. There are many other posts for that.2. Do not share projects with high capitalization whose chances of making a 100x are practically zero.2. Try to be concise. Share a ticker and an explanation about the project if you want.4. Respect the first 3 rules and this will be a thread where other users can easily consult hundreds of projects and do their own research.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Nefelibato on November 18, 2023, 07:01:21 PMAnyone who has experienced a bull run in this market knows that many cryptocurrencies multiply their price x100.    Rules1. Refrain from sharing investment tips, they are not welcome here. There are many other posts for that.2. Do not share projects with high capitalization whose chances of making a 100x are practically zero.2. Try to be concise. Share a ticker and an explanation about the project if you want.4. Respect the first 3 rules and this will be a thread where other users can easily consult hundreds of projects and do their own research.If everyone will follow these rules, this could be an interesting thread to follow. Especially if people are posting some interesting new microcaps. I haven't looked microcaps for a while, but they can be profitable as hell even if they never cross the $1M MC. Buying the bottom and selling the fomo is hard and risky business, but i have invested to several projects that did 100x in the past. But majority of my microcap investments have busted of course but all it takes is few. And it's really hard work to monitor them all to find one decent one, which isn't a copy of another one.I don't have any at the moment, but i'll be posting if i find one, and definitely look trough the answers.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Nefelibato on November 18, 2023, 07:01:21 PMRules(....)1. Refrain from sharing investment tips, they are not welcome here. There are many other posts for that.2. Do not share projects with high capitalization whose chances of making a 100x are practically zero.(....)I believe most of the people who want their bags to be multiplied, for sure they will share it to other people after they already positioned, this is very common on social media especially those people who got lot of followers, it's more likely they will just make their followers as exit liquidity, so it will be sad for those people who entered late.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: Nefelibato on November 18, 2023, 07:01:21 PMAnyone who has experienced a bull run in this market knows that many cryptocurrencies multiply their price x100.    Rules1. Refrain from sharing investment tips, they are not welcome here. There are many other posts for that.2. Do not share projects with high capitalization whose chances of making a 100x are practically zero.2. Try to be concise. Share a ticker and an explanation about the project if you want.4. Respect the first 3 rules and this will be a thread where other users can easily consult hundreds of projects and do their own research.If you are truly  wanted to prevent not related posts then you should have created this thread as "Self Moderated"  that is what will help you clean the  thread from not necessary posts? and also assuming that thereare x100 coin , do you really believe that we can find those that easy? I am afraid you can just post here and find it best.also please refrain yourself from believing about the x100 because from what i learned from this forum  most of the losersare coming from those expecting so much increase.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Is like you have intention to invest in altcoins that is why you came up with this rules so that people will not give you wrong direction to invest in this season. I will advise you to continue hodling if you have already bought altcoins and, try to apply long hodling so  that you will achieve what other people are achieving from the community because, there is no way you will hodl for this bull run to come you will not achieve a good profits that will add value to your investment.What you are seeing now in the crypto market is a small thing compare what is coming soon for people to confirm that bull run has come to stay for long hodlers and short hodlers investors to earn well from their investment .

comments.author: huu78
comments.body: actually there are several coins that have produced 100x ROI but only a few people can hold on like that, I wonder if anyone bought bnb when the bnb price was still below 5$ if there was then he has been waiting for a long time and deserves the prize.
